mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Convention Time in Texas", "Oklahoma Hills", and "Poor Little Robin". ROUND DANCES "Darling Waltz", and "Waltz Carousel". SPECIAL FEATURES "Styles Offer Scope and Imagination", "Frills and Furbelows", "Pats on the Back", "What Can I Do To Help?", "Book Review: Help for Teachers", and "Exhibitions and Demonstrations". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "Women on the Square", "The Square Dance Picture", "Square of the Month", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Green Sheet", "From the Floor", "On the Record", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
